articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio Ulster commentary as Northern Ireland face Finland in Helsinki in their Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifiers: Finland v Northern Ireland - radio and text

articles.description: Everton receive an immediate 10-point deduction after being found to have breached the Premier League's profit and sustainability rules.
articles.title: Everton receive immediate 10-point deduction

articles.description: First practice at the Las Vegas Grand Prix is called off after just nine minutes of running because of a problem with a loose drain cover.
articles.title: Las Vegas first practice called off over drain cover

articles.description: England and Real Madrid midfielder Jude Bellingham wins the 2023 Golden Boy award - given to the best under-21 player in Europe's top flights.
articles.title: Bellingham wins Golden Boy award

articles.description: Relive five great moments from the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup, including Glenn Maxwell's double century, Virat Kohli's record and Angelo Matthews' controversial timed-out dismissal.
articles.title: Relive five great moments from the Cricket World Cup

articles.description: England's Richard Illingworth and Richard Kettleborough are chosen to umpire Sunday's Cricket World Cup final.
articles.title: English duo chosen as World Cup final umpires

articles.description: Arsenal manager Jonas Eidevall says supporting players who "struggle with pay" is more important than addressing equal pay at the top of the game.
articles.title: WSL players who 'struggle' with pay is 'big problem'

articles.description: Dale Houghton is given a 12-week suspended jail term for mocking the young Sunderland fan's death.
articles.title: Bradley Lowery: Sheffield Wednesday fan sentenced over photo jibe

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz will play Novak Djokovic in the last four of the ATP Finals after he beat Daniil Medvedev to top the group.
articles.title: Alcaraz wins to set up semi-final against Djokovic

articles.description: The Women's Super League continues with Old Trafford hosting the first Manchester derby and Chelsea looking to continue their unbeaten start.
articles.title: Manchester derby 'unbelievable' - WSL talking points
